casebody.data:
No. 813,

Misc.

Tri-Continental Financial Corp. v. United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit. Mathias F. Correa for petitioner. Solicitor General Rankin filed a memorandum for the United States, as amicus curiae.

The motion of petitioner for leave to file supplementary appendix is granted. Motion for leave to file petition for writ of mandamus and other relief denied.
